snippet: The New York City Housing Authority said it hoped to cut the backlog of pending orders by year’s end, but also said the timetable was threatened by federal spending cuts.
abstract: The New York City Housing Authority said it hoped to cut the backlog of pending orders by year’s end, but also said the timetable was threatened by federal spending cuts.

headline.main: City Announces New Goal for Public Housing Repairs, but With Big Caveat
